department: Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC)
description: Request for proposal from PWGSC and ESDC, requiring the acquisition, delivery and installation of furniture for the region of Alma, scheduled on June 2024.
full_summary:
================
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Title
EF937-241075 - Purchase of Furniture for ESDC - RFP

#### Reference Number
WS4261176360-Doc4261211987

#### Amendment Number
3

#### Solicitation Number
WS4261176360

#### Publication Date
October 20, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date
December 15, 2023 at 14:00 (14:00 hours)

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to companies in Canada registered with the following international trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Procurement Details
This is an open bidding tender for the purchase of furniture under Supply Arrangement. 

#### Furniture Requirements
Accommodation furniture for the Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC), located in Alma, Quebec, Canada.

#### Delivery Location
Furniture will be delivered to the Department of Employment and Social Development (ESDC), located in Alma, Quebec, Canada.

#### Contracting Entity Details
* Name:  Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information
* Name: Corine Lavoie (SPAC/ PSPC) 
* Email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Digital Access to Tender
------------------------

For access to the tender documents and other information, please refer to the following URL:  https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17781621?extsite=MTc3ODE2MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==. Registration is mandatory before participating in the tender process. 

We kindly request that all bidders monitor the website for updates and amendments to this tender announcement. 
   
#### Important Dates
* Publication Date: October 20, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: December 15, 2023
